mapper.select: SELECT , "DbT2003Kibetsu"."ki", "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choshuHouhou", "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu"."choteigaku" FROM rgdb."DbV2002Fuka" AS "DbT2002Fuka" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS "DbT2003Kibetsu" ON "DbT2002Fuka"."choteiNendo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choteiNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."fukaNendo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."fukaNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."tsuchishoNo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."tsuchishoNo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."rirekiNo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" ON "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choteiId" = "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu"."choteiId" AND "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu"."choteigaku" > 0 WHERE "DbT2002Fuka"."choteiNendo" = #{調定年度} AND "DbT2002Fuka"."fukaNendo" = #{賦課年度} ORDER BY "DbT2002Fuka"."tsuchishoNo"
SELECT "TmpHeijunkaMae".*, "TmpHeijunkaKeisanKeka".* FROM "TmpHeijunkaMae" INNER JOIN "TmpHeijunkaKeisanKeka" ON "TmpHeijunkaMae"."tsuchishoNo" = "TmpHeijunkaKeisanKeka"."通知書番号"

result.property: 特別徴収義務者コード

id.property: 特別徴収義務者コード

result.property: 徴収方法Newest_仮徴収_年金コード

mapper.update: UPDATE rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" SET "lastUpdateTimestamp" = #{システーム日時}, "kijunTimestamp" = #{調定日時}, "updateCount" = "updateCount" + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND "subGyomuCode" = 'DBB' AND "shoriName" = '特徴平準化計算_6月分' AND "shoriEdaban" = '0001' AND "nendo" = #{調定年度} AND "nendoNaiRenban" = '0001'
